casebody.data:
Edwin A. Cruz VARGAS, Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D17-4011 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. May 18, 2018

BY ORDER OF THE COURT:

Petitioner's petition for belated appeal is denied.

CASANUEVA, LUCAS, and ATKINSON, JJ., Concur.
